1249.question: How much important is the visual grounding in the learning of the multilingual representations?

7-Table1-1.png: The visual grounding plays a crucial role in the learning of multilingual representations. As seen in the table, the proposed method, ImageVec, achieves higher semantic similarity scores across various subtasks compared to previous work. This indicates that incorporating visual information through visual grounding significantly improves the performance of multilingual representation learning.

1249.answer: performance is significantly degraded without pixel data
